name: Santa's Workshop (itch) (Coborax)
description:
Santa's Workshop

Manage Santa's Workshop and produce gifts for all the children in the world!

Controls:

WASD - Camera Movement

R - Rotate objects before placing

Mouse - Navigate menus

Tools: Visual Studio[Code], Pyxel Edit[Art], Bosca Soil[Music]

The game is written in C# using monogame

Hints:

Plastic + Battery in a assembler = Robot Toy

Leather in a Air Pump = Football
